name: Me and my SHOTGUN
description:
Plot:

    You and your beloved SHOTGUN once woke up not at home in a warm bed, but in the underworld where you are met by an unknown creature in a hood...

Controls:

    WASD - Move

    Lmb - Shoot

    R - reload your beloved 

Special credits:

    Thanks him for the great main art - https://vk.com/teapubbonk
